scripts.build: NODE_PATH=./src NODE_ENV=production ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js src/client/index.js -o public/js/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.build:dev: NODE_PATH=./src NODE_ENV=development ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js src/client/index.js -o public/js/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run minify && source .env && NODE_ENV=production node --harmony_default_parameters --harmony-destructuring src/server/index.js
scripts.start:dev: npm run build:dev && source .env && nodemon --delay 2 --harmony_default_parameters --harmony-destructuring src/server/index.js
